Change log

Source: NEWS.md

codemetar 0.1.5 Unreleased

  • Default to DOI-based schema. (previous CN issues now resolved)

codemetar 0.1.4 2018-02-12 2018-02-12

  • Allow vignettes to gracefully handle network timeout errors that may occur on CRAN’s Windows build server.

codemetar 0.1.3 2018-02-08 2018-02-08

  • CRAN release
  • Switch to http://purl.org based URIs for the JSON-LD Context file instead of a DOI, due to frequent failure of content negotiation on DataCite servers (#34)
  • bugfix UTF-8 characters in CITATION files (#44)
  • bugfix to git URLs
  • Use https on ORCID @id URIs

codemetar 0.1.2 Unreleased

  • JOSS release

codemetar 0.1.1 Unreleased

  • Post onboarding release

codemetar 0.1.0 Unreleased

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
